languages.text: "Их жизни отравлены страхом и ненавистью, их слова и мысли — сочащийся яд, но мон-кай предпочитают прятаться за масками и не замечать этого, чем что-либо менять..."
"Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."
languages.original_text: "Их жизни отравлены страхом и ненавистью, их слова и мысли — сочащийся яд, но мон-кай предпочитают прятаться за масками и не замечать этого, чем что-либо менять..."

traits.locale_text: "Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."
"Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."
"Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."
"Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."

languages.text: 「恐怖と憎しみに毒された暮らし、言葉も考えも毒が滲むくせに、モン＝ケイどもは何ひとつ変えようとせず、仮面の陰に隠れる方を選ぶ」
languages.original_text: "Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."

traits.locale_text: 「恐怖と憎しみに毒された暮らし、言葉も考えも毒が滲むくせに、モン＝ケイどもは何ひとつ変えようとせず、仮面の陰に隠れる方を選ぶ。」

languages.text: «Sus vidas están emponzoñadas por el miedo y el odio, sus palabras y pensamientos rezuman veneno, y aun así los mon-keigh prefieren ocultarse tras esas máscaras en vez de cambiar su sino».
languages.original_text: "Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."

traits.locale_text: «Sus vidas están emponzoñadas por el miedo y el odio, sus palabras y pensamientos rezuman veneno, y aun así los mon-keigh prefieren ocultarse tras esas máscaras en vez de cambiar su sino».

languages.text: “这些猴子被恐惧与仇恨毒害。他们的言语与思想流淌着毒液，可他们却躲在面具后面，不肯做出任何改变。”
languages.original_text: "Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."

traits.locale_text: “这些猴子被恐惧与仇恨毒害。他们的言语与思想流淌着毒液，可他们却躲在面具后面，不肯做出任何改变。”

languages.text: "Ihr Leben ist durch Furcht und Hass vergiftet. Aus ihren Worten und Gedanken trieft Gift und doch haben sich die Chem-Pan-Sey entschlossen, sich hinter Masken zu verstecken, anstatt etwas zu verändern."
languages.original_text: "Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Leben ist durch Furcht und Hass vergiftet. Aus ihren Worten und Gedanken trieft Gift und doch haben sich die Chem-Pan-Sey entschlossen, sich hinter Masken zu verstecken, anstatt etwas zu verändern."

languages.text: « Leur vie est empoisonnée par la crainte et la haine, leurs paroles et leurs pensées dégoulinent de venin, et pourtant, les synjes préfèrent se cacher derrière un masque plutôt que d'y changer quoi que ce soit. »
languages.original_text: "Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."

traits.locale_text: « Leur vie est empoisonnée par la crainte et la haine, leurs paroles et leurs pensées dégoulinent de venin, et pourtant, les synjes préfèrent se cacher derrière un masque plutôt que d'y changer quoi que ce soit. »

languages.text: "Hayatları korkuyla ve nefretle zıkkıma dönmüş, sözleri ve düşüncelerinden zehir damlıyor... Yine de mon-keighler, bir şeyleri değiştirmek yerine maskelerin ardına saklanmayı seçiyor."
languages.original_text: "Their lives are poisoned by fear and hatred, their words and thoughts drip with venom, yet the mon-keigh choose to hide behind masks rather than change anything."

traits.locale_text: "Hayatları korkuyla ve nefretle zıkkıma dönmüş, sözleri ve düşüncelerinden zehir damlıyor... Yine de mon-keighler, bir şeyleri değiştirmek yerine maskelerin ardına saklanmayı seçiyor."
